Other Sites: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/まんが家マリナ・シリーズ#映画
TitleEnglish: Ai to ken Camelot: Mangaka Marina Time Slip
SummaryEnglish: Based more or less loosely on the Mangaka Marina novels for teenage girls by Fujimoto Hitomi. Marina meets beautiful boys in a SF Fantasy based in Medieval England.
Aliases: Ai to Ken no Camelot: Mangaka Marina Time Slip Jiken
Marina the Manga Artist Goes to Camelot
